name: SIMEON (SImilarity Measures ONtology)
tagline: SIMEON (SImilarity MEasures ONtology) is an ontology for expressing similarities between objects and collections.
body:
# SIMEON Ontology
The SIMEON (SImilarity Measures ONtology) is an ontology for expressing similarites between objects and collections in ontologies. 

## Download SIMEON
Latest stable version: 1.0.

- [RDF format](simeon.rdf)
- [Turtle format](simeon.ttl)
- [OWL functional format](simeon.owl)

## Specification
The vocabulary provided by this ontology (classes, object properties, data properties and axioms) is detailed in the [specification](specification/index.html) page.

## Author
